answers.answer: Same here and same weeks as you. That can be normal. My dr told me to drink at least 64ozs a day. Also have you had your glucose test done yet?

I'm almost 9 weeks and I have the same thing going on! They actually did a glucose test on me Monda.  Waiting to hear back. If you havent had one yet itmight be a good idea. If you have, just stay hydrated. Remeber that caffeine is a diuretic and you will pee a ton and be thirsty more!
No i go tuesday for mine, i have been trying tk stay away from caffine the last couple of days and more water
Yes I agree... you gonna have to cut the caffeine. I'm not big on water...I'm a juice person but I can admit those 64ozs make me feel a lot better.
I want child water all the time but I'm never hungry
Cold lol auto correct is awesome
Try powerade or Gatorade it helps along with water :)
you might have gestational diabetes that's a sign of it

Extreme thirst is the first sign of any diabetes not just while youre pregnant. Im always thirsty too though.. i mean i cant get enough.. i get a belly ache cz im so full of water but ill gladly keep chugging even if it means i vomit up only water.. i cant help it. But my test was negative so you never know. Have u been tested yet?
Not yet i have my test on tuesday so we will see i guess :-

Just a heads up lots of women fail their one hour test and have to go back for a three hr one. So dont be discouraged if you have to go back! I didnt but as thirsty as i get i thought i had GD.. im all clear tho just the thirst of pregnancy i guess?
Im about 18 wks & I seem to b really thirsty at night, keep a big glass of water by bed! And of course up 2-4 times having to go potty!
Im about 18 wks & I seem to b really thirsty at night, keep a big glass of water by bed! And of course up 2-4 times having to go potty!

question: I am 26 weeks and i cant get enough to drink!!! Anyone else!?!
title: super thirsty!!!!
